languages.text: {n}Мука сомнения ложится на лицо преподобного, но тут же сменяется прежней убежденностью.{/n} "Даже если ваши намерения чисты, вы слишком испорчены... Отравлены. Нет, вопрос стоит ясно — или вы, или мы. Мир и сосуществование невозможны".

traits.locale_text: {n}Мука сомнения ложится на лицо преподобного, но тут же сменяется прежней убежденностью.{/n} "Даже если ваши намерения чисты, если вы говорите правду... Нет, вопрос стоит ясно — или вы, или мы. Мир и сосуществование невозможны".

languages.text: {n}Tortured doubt lingers on the confessor's face for a moment before being superseded by his former conviction.{/n} "Even if your intentions are pure, you are too tainted... Poisoned. No, the matter is clear — you or us. Peace and coexistence are impossible."
languages.original_text: {n}Мука сомнения ложится на лицо преподобного, но тут же сменяется прежней убежденностью.{/n} "Даже если ваши намерения чисты, вы слишком испорчены... Отравлены. Нет, вопрос стоит ясно — или вы, или мы. Мир и сосуществование невозможны".

{n}Tortured doubt lingers on the confessor's face for a moment before being superseded by his former conviction.{/n} "Even if your intentions are pure, you are too tainted... Poisoned. No, the matter is clear — you or us. Peace and coexistence are impossible."

{n}Tortured doubt lingers on the confessor's face for a moment before being superseded by his former conviction.{/n} "Even if your intentions are pure, you are too tainted... Poisoned. No, the matter is clear — you or us. Peace and coexistence are impossible."

languages.text: {n}La duda acecha en el rostro del confesor durante un instante hasta ser reemplazada por su firme convicción.{/n} «Aunque sus intenciones fuesen puras, sigue estando corrupt{mf|o|a}... es veneno. No, este asunto está zanjado: o ustedes o nosotros. No hay cabida para la paz y la coexistencia».
languages.original_text: {n}Tortured doubt lingers on the confessor's face for a moment before being superseded by his former conviction.{/n} "Even if your intentions are pure, you are too tainted... Poisoned. No, the matter is clear — you or us. Peace and coexistence are impossible."

traits.locale_text: {n}La duda acecha en el rostro del confesor durante un instante hasta ser reemplazada por su firme convicción.{/n} «Aunque sus intenciones fuesen puras, sigue estando corrupt{mf|o|a}... es veneno. No, este asunto está zanjado: o ustedes o nosotros. No hay cabida para la paz y la coexistencia».

languages.text: {n}懺悔者の顔には、かつての確信に取って代わられるまで、一瞬、拷問のような疑念が残る。 {/n}「たとえあなたの意図が純粋であっても、あなたはあまりにも汚染されていて…毒されている。いや、問題はハッキリしている。平和と共存は不可能だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Tortured doubt lingers on the confessor's face for a moment before being superseded by his former conviction.{/n} "Even if your intentions are pure, you are too tainted... Poisoned. No, the matter is clear — you or us. Peace and coexistence are impossible."

traits.locale_text: {n}懺悔者の顔には、かつての確信に取って代わられるまで、一瞬、拷問のような疑念が残る。 {/n}「たとえあなたの意図が純粋であっても、あなたはあまりにも汚染されていて…毒されている。いや、問題はハッキリしている。平和と共存は不可能だ」

languages.text: {n}告解神父的脸上浮现出了痛苦的怀疑之色，随后，他原本的信念再次涌入了他的意识。{/n}“即便你的意图是纯洁的，你也已经过于堕落……你受的毒害太深了。不可能，局势很清楚：不是你死，就是我亡。我们之间不可能和平共处。”
languages.original_text: {n}Tortured doubt lingers on the confessor's face for a moment before being superseded by his former conviction.{/n} "Even if your intentions are pure, you are too tainted... Poisoned. No, the matter is clear — you or us. Peace and coexistence are impossible."

traits.locale_text: {n}告解神父的脸上浮现出了痛苦的怀疑之色，随后，他原本的信念再次涌入了他的意识。{/n}“即便你的意图是纯洁的，你也已经过于堕落……你受的毒害太深了。不可能，局势很清楚：不是你死，就是我亡。我们之间不可能和平共处。”

languages.text: {n}Ein gequälter Zweifel huscht über das Gesicht des Konfessors, ehe er wieder seiner gewohnten Überzeugung weicht.{/n} "Selbst, wenn Eure Absichten rein sind, Ihr seid zu befleckt ... Vergiftet. Nein, die Angelegenheit ist klar ... ihr oder wir. Friede und Koexistenz sind unmöglich."
languages.original_text: {n}Tortured doubt lingers on the confessor's face for a moment before being superseded by his former conviction.{/n} "Even if your intentions are pure, you are too tainted... Poisoned. No, the matter is clear — you or us. Peace and coexistence are impossible."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein gequälter Zweifel huscht über das Gesicht des Konfessors, ehe er wieder seiner gewohnten Überzeugung weicht.{/n} "Selbst, wenn Eure Absichten rein sind, Ihr seid zu befleckt ... Vergiftet. Nein, die Angelegenheit ist klar ... ihr oder wir. Friede und Koexistenz sind unmöglich."

languages.text: {n}Un bref instant, le visage du confesseur semble comme torturé par le doute, mais très vite, ses anciennes convictions reprennent le dessus.{/n} « Même si vos intentions sont pures, vous êtes trop {mf|corrompu|corrompue}… {mf|Empoisonné|Empoisonnée}. Non, tout est limpide. C'est vous, ou nous. Paix et coexistence sont tout bonnement impossibles. »
languages.original_text: {n}Tortured doubt lingers on the confessor's face for a moment before being superseded by his former conviction.{/n} "Even if your intentions are pure, you are too tainted... Poisoned. No, the matter is clear — you or us. Peace and coexistence are impossible."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un bref instant, le visage du confesseur semble comme torturé par le doute, mais très vite, ses anciennes convictions reprennent le dessus.{/n} « Même si vos intentions sont pures, vous êtes trop {mf|corrompu|corrompue}… {mf|Empoisonné|Empoisonnée}. Non, tout est limpide. C'est vous, ou nous. Paix et coexistence sont tout bonnement impossibles. »

languages.text: {n}Günah çıkarıcının yüzünde bir anlığına kederli bir şüphe dolanıyor ancak eski kararlılığı bu duyguyu bastırıyor.{/n} "Niyetin saf bile olsa sen fazlasıyla kirlenmiş, hatta zehirlenmiş durumdasın. Hayır, olması gereken belli: Siz veya biz. Barış yapmak ve birlikte yaşamak imkânsız."
languages.original_text: {n}Tortured doubt lingers on the confessor's face for a moment before being superseded by his former conviction.{/n} "Even if your intentions are pure, you are too tainted... Poisoned. No, the matter is clear — you or us. Peace and coexistence are impossible."
